EmailTemplate.description: When an opportunity gets closed from the mobile app, send a welcoming email to the new user
EmailTemplate.name: Mobile Welcome
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for your purchase!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Paul,
Thank you for purchasing Digital Bank Silver Credit Card. Please find any relevant information regarding terms and conditions about your new product here.
Thanks, {!Organization.Name}
Visit our website
Digital Bank is an initiative by Deloitte Digital
